en: Central and Southern Military and Political Committee

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期中南地区的最高政权机关。
description.en: The highest organ of state power in the Central and Southern China region during the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、军事家，曾任中南军政委员会主席。

description.en: Chinese politician and military leader, served as Vice Chairman of the Central and Southern Military and Political Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中南军政委员会副主席。

en: Central and Southern Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.en: A central bureau established by the Communist Party of China in the Central and Southern region during the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期设置的一级行政区划。

description.zh-cn: 中南军政委员会的后继机构。

description.en: A prefecture-level city in Henan Province, China, where the Central Plains Provisional People's Government was established.

description.en: Chinese politician, served as a member of the Central and Southern Military and Political Committee.

description.en: Chinese politician, served as a member, Director of the Political and Legal Affairs Committee, and Director of the Land Reform Committee of the Central and Southern Military and Political Committee.

description.en: Chinese politician, served as a member of the Central and Southern Military and Political Committee.

description.en: Chinese politician, served as a member, Secretary-General, Deputy Director of the Political and Legal Affairs Committee, and Director of the Ethnic Affairs Committee of the Central and Southern Military and Political Committee.

description.en: Chinese politician, served as a member of the Central and Southern Military and Political Committee.

description.en: Chinese politician and military leader, served as a member, Deputy Director of the Political and Legal Affairs Committee, and Minister of Justice of the Central and Southern Military and Political Committee.

description.en: Chinese politician, served as a member, Director of the Culture and Education Committee, and Minister of Culture of the Central and Southern Military and Political Committee.

description.en: Chinese military leader, served as a member and Director of the People's Supervisory Committee of the Central and Southern Military and Political Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中南军政委员会委员、最高人民法院中南分院院长。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as a member of the Central and Southern Military and Political Committee and President of the Central-South Branch of the Supreme People's Court.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中南军政委员会委员、政法委员会副主任、公安部部长、最高人民检察署中南分署检察长。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as a member, Deputy Director of the Political and Legal Affairs Committee, Minister of Public Security of the Central and Southern Military and Political Committee, and Procurator-General of the Central-South Branch of the Supreme People's Procuratorate.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中南军政委员会委员、土地改革委员会副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as a member and Deputy Director of the Land Reform Committee of the Central and Southern Military and Political Committee.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)

description.zh-cn: 中央人民政府于1949年12月任命中南军政委员会主席、副主席和委员。
description.en: The Central People's Government appointed the chairman, vice-chairmen, and members of the Central and Southern Military and Political Committee in December 1949.

description.zh-cn: 中南军政委员会成立后，经中央人民政府委员会批准，撤销了中原临时人民政府。
description.en: After the establishment of the Central and Southern Military and Political Committee, the Central Plains Provisional People's Government was abolished with the approval of the Central People's Government Council.

description.zh-cn: 根据中央人民政府决定，中南军政委员会改组为中南行政委员会，中南军政委员会随之撤销。
description.en: According to the decision of the Central People's Government, the Central and Southern Military and Political Committee was reorganized into the Central and Southern Administrative Committee, and the former was subsequently abolished.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)

description.zh-cn: 中南军政委员会是中央人民政府在中华人民共和国成立初期设立的大行政区军政委员会之一。
description.en: The Central and Southern Military and Political Committee was one of the military and political committees of the greater administrative areas established by the Central People's Government in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中南军政委员会接受中国共产党中央中南局的领导。
description.en: The Central and Southern Military and Political Committee was under the leadership of the CPC Central Committee's Central and Southern Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 自1950年8月起，因林彪病赴北京，邓子恢任中南军政委员会代主席。
description.en: Since August 1950, Deng Zihui served as the Acting Chairman of the Central and Southern Military and Political Committee after Lin Biao went to Beijing due to illness.

description.en: The Central-South Branch of the Supreme People's Court was one of the working bodies of the Central and Southern Military and Political Committee.

description.en: The Central-South Branch of the Supreme People's Procuratorate was one of the working bodies of the Central and Southern Military and Political Committee.

中南军政委员会财经委员会

description.zh-cn: 1950年3月至12月任主任，1950年12月后任副主任。
description.en: Served as Director from March to December 1950, and as Deputy Director after December 1950.

relationships.source: 中南军政委员会人事部
relationships.target: 中南军政委员会人事局

description.zh-cn: 1951年3月，中南军政委员会人事局改组为中南军政委员会人事部。
description.en: In March 1951, the Personnel Bureau of the Central and Southern Military and Political Committee was reorganized into the Ministry of Personnel.

relationships.source: 中南军政委员会工业部
relationships.target: 中南军政委员会重工业部

description.zh-cn: 1950年11月，中南军政委员会重工业部与轻工业部合并成立工业部。
description.en: In November 1950, the Ministry of Heavy Industry and the Ministry of Light Industry of the Central and Southern Military and Political Committee were merged to form the Ministry of Industry.

relationships.source: 中南军政委员会工业部
relationships.target: 中南军政委员会轻工业部

description.en: In November 1950, the Ministry of Heavy Industry and the Ministry of Light Industry of the Central and Southern Military and Political Committee were merged to form the Ministry of Industry.
